subject: Re: Request for Account Unlock – Affiliate ID: 7134626
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Support Team,

Thank you for your message.

As requested, I have attached screenshots showing the issue I am currently
encountering. According to my affiliate dashboard, my account status
displays the message: “Your account is blocked! You will no longer receive
credit for your referrals.” As a result, I am unable to access my referral
link or coupon code (please see the attached images for reference).
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]


I would like to kindly clarify that this issue was very likely caused by
unauthorized login attempts from different locations. I believe my account
may have been targeted by a hacker who repeatedly attempted to access it,
which then triggered GOAFFPRO’s automatic security system. Consequently,
all related affiliate projects were temporarily locked as a security
measure to protect my funds and prevent any unauthorized changes to my
PayPal payment information.

After contacting several of my affiliate partners, some of them have
already reviewed the situation and were willing to verify and unlock my
affiliate accounts. I have also attached screenshots of these confirmations
as additional reference. This gives me confidence that the issue was
security-related rather than due to any intentional violation of platform
rules.
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png][image: image.png][image: image.png]

[image: image.png][image: image.png][image: image.png]


[image: image.png][image: image.png][image: image.png]
I truly hope you can understand my situation and kindly assist in reviewing
and reopening my Simsonn affiliate account. I am fully committed to
complying with all GOAFFPRO and Simsonn affiliate policies and am more than
happy to provide any further information or verification if needed.

Thank you very much for your time, understanding, and support.

Kind regards,
Tony Pham
